td.p: North West Company. Agreement 1804 and Agreement 1802. An electronic transcription. MFTP #0027

div.p: be aided and assisted in all occasions by the Wintering Partners whose duty it shall also be to attend in a Particular manner to the Business of their respective Departments[.]

That the accounts of each years Outfit shall be regularly closed after the Outfit is made by the said House of McTavish Frobisher & Co and one sett of accounts Current shall be then annually forwarded to the Grand Portage one sett to Temiscamingue and to any other of the Departments when the Parties concurred cannot conveniently attend at the Grand Portage to be by the said Parties signed and interchanged; and any of the said Parties having any objections to the said accounts shall be bound to deliver in the same in writing within the ten Days after such accounts shall have been presented to him otherwise the said accounts shall be taken and considered as approved of by every such Party as fully and sufficiently as if he had signed the same.

That a meeting or meetings if necessary of the Partners as conveniently can attend shall be annually held in the months of June or July at the Grand Portage at which meetings the Partners who cannot attend may be represented by their attornies who shall be entitled to vote for them in order to deliberate and determined upon all such matters and things as to them shall seem fit & proper to be done and executed and performed in and about the trade and Commerce aforesaid and the Interests thereof and the Majority of the Partners present or represented at the said meetings are hereby authorised and empowered to settle & determine all differences and difficulties among the Partners and all

td.p:
L E G E N D :
in red , modifications made by the editor(s).
in lavender , modifications made by the assumed author(s).
